verses.verse: Moreover he said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> eat <WH398> <WH853> that <WH834> thou findest; <WH4672> eat <WH398> this <WH2063> <WH853> roll, <WH4039> and go <WH1980> speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> the house <WH1004> of Israel. <WH3478>
So I opened <WH6605> <WH853> my mouth, <WH6310> and he caused me to eat <WH398> <WH853> that <WH2063> roll. <WH4039>

And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> cause thy belly <WH990> to eat, <WH398> and fill <WH4390> thy bowels <WH4578> with <WH854> this <WH2063> roll <WH4039> that <WH834> I <WH589> give <WH5414> <WH413> thee. Then did I eat <WH398> it; and it was <WH1961> in my mouth <WH6310> as honey <WH1706> for sweetness. <WH4966>

And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> go, <WH1980> get <WH935> thee unto <WH413> the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> and speak <WH1696> with my words <WH1697> unto <WH413> them.

For <WH3588> thou <WH859> art not <WH3808> sent <WH7971> to <WH413> a people <WH5971> of a strange <WH6012> speech <WH8193> and of a hard <WH3515> language, <WH3956> but to <WH413> the house <WH1004> of Israel; <WH3478>

Not <WH3808> to <WH413> many <WH7227> people <WH5971> of a strange <WH6012> speech <WH8193> and of a hard <WH3515> language, <WH3956> whose <WH834> words <WH1697> thou canst not <WH3808> understand. <WH8085> Surely, <WH518> <WH3808> had I sent <WH7971> thee to <WH413> them, they <WH1992> would have hearkened <WH8085> unto <WH413> thee.

But the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> will <WH14> not <WH3808> hearken <WH8085> unto <WH413> thee; for <WH3588> they will <WH14> not <WH369> hearken <WH8085> unto <WH413> me: for <WH3588> all <WH3605> the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> are impudent <WH2389> <WH4696> and hardhearted. <WH7186> <WH3820>

Behold, <WH2009> I have made <WH5414> <WH853> thy face <WH6440> strong <WH2389> against <WH5980> their faces, <WH6440> and <WH853> thy forehead <WH4696> strong <WH2389> against <WH5980> their foreheads. <WH4696>

As an adamant <WH8068> harder <WH2389> than flint <WH4480> <WH6864> have I made <WH5414> thy forehead: <WH4696> fear <WH3372> them not, <WH3808> neither <WH3808> be dismayed <WH2865> at their looks, <WH4480> <WH6440> though <WH3588> they <WH1992> be a rebellious <WH4805> house. <WH1004>

Moreover he said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> <WH853> all <WH3605> my words <WH1697> that <WH834> I shall speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> thee receive <WH3947> in thine heart, <WH3824> and hear <WH8085> with thine ears. <WH241>

And go, <WH1980> get <WH935> thee to <WH413> them of the captivity, <WH1473> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of thy people, <WH5971> and speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> them, and tell <WH559> <WH413> them, Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> whether <WH518> they will hear, <WH8085> or whether <WH518> they will forbear. <WH2308>

Then the spirit <WH7307> took me up, <WH5375> and I heard <WH8085> behind <WH310> me a voice <WH6963> of a great <WH1419> rushing, <WH7494> saying, Blessed <WH1288> be the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> from his place. <WH4480> <WH4725>

I heard also the noise <WH6963> of the wings <WH3671> of the living creatures <WH2416> that touched <WH5401> one <WH802> another, <WH269> and the noise <WH6963> of the wheels <WH212> over against <WH5980> them, and a noise <WH6963> of a great <WH1419> rushing. <WH7494>

So the spirit <WH7307> lifted me up, <WH5375> and took me away, <WH3947> and I went <WH1980> in bitterness, <WH4751> in the heat <WH2534> of my spirit; <WH7307> but the hand <WH3027> of the LORD <WH3068> was strong <WH2389> upon <WH5921> me.

Then I came <WH935> to <WH413> them of the captivity <WH1473> at Tel-abib, <WH8512> that dwelt <WH3427> by <WH413> the river <WH5104> of Chebar, <WH3529> and I sat <WH3427> where <WH8033> they <WH1992> sat, <WH3427> and remained <WH3427> there <WH8033> astonished <WH8074> among <WH8432> them seven <WH7651> days. <WH3117>
And it came to pass <WH1961> at the end <WH4480> <WH7097> of seven <WH7651> days, <WH3117> that the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> unto <WH413> me, saying, <WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> I have made <WH5414> thee a watchman <WH6822> unto the house <WH1004> of Israel: <WH3478> therefore hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> at my mouth, <WH4480> <WH6310> and give them warning <WH2094> <WH853> from <WH4480> me.

When I say <WH559> unto the wicked, <WH7563> Thou shalt surely die; <WH4191> <WH4191> and thou givest him not warning, <WH2094> <WH3808> nor <WH3808> speakest <WH1696> to warn <WH2094> the wicked <WH7563> from his wicked <WH7563> way, <WH4480> <WH1870> to save his life; <WH2421> the same <WH1931> wicked <WH7563> man shall die <WH4191> in his iniquity; <WH5771> but his blood <WH1818> will I require <WH1245> at thine hand. <WH4480> <WH3027>

Yet if <WH3588> thou <WH859> warn <WH2094> the wicked, <WH7563> and he turn <WH7725> not <WH3808> from his wickedness, <WH4480> <WH7562> nor from his wicked <WH7563> way, <WH4480> <WH1870> he <WH1931> shall die <WH4191> in his iniquity; <WH5771> but thou <WH859> hast delivered <WH5337> <WH853> thy soul. <WH5315>

Again, When a righteous <WH6662> man doth turn <WH7725> from his righteousness, <WH4480> <WH6664> and commit <WH6213> iniquity, <WH5766> and I lay <WH5414> a stumblingblock <WH4383> before <WH6440> him, he <WH1931> shall die: <WH4191> because <WH3588> thou hast not <WH3808> given him warning, <WH2094> he shall die <WH4191> in his sin, <WH2403> and his righteousness <WH6666> which <WH834> he hath done <WH6213> shall not <WH3808> be remembered; <WH2142> but his blood <WH1818> will I require <WH1245> at thine hand. <WH4480> <WH3027>

Nevertheless if <WH3588> thou <WH859> warn <WH2094> the righteous <WH6662> man, that the righteous <WH6662> sin <WH2398> not, <WH1115> and he <WH1931> doth not <WH3808> sin, <WH2398> he shall surely live, <WH2421> <WH2421> because <WH3588> he is warned; <WH2094> also thou <WH859> hast delivered <WH5337> <WH853> thy soul. <WH5315>

And the hand <WH3027> of the LORD <WH3068> was <WH1961> there <WH8033> upon <WH5921> me; and he said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Arise, <WH6965> go forth <WH3318> into <WH413> the plain, <WH1237> and I will there <WH8033> talk <WH1696> with <WH854> thee.

Then I arose, <WH6965> and went forth <WH3318> into <WH413> the plain: <WH1237> and, behold, <WH2009> the glory <WH3519> of the LORD <WH3068> stood <WH5975> there, <WH8033> as the glory <WH3519> which <WH834> I saw <WH7200> by <WH5921> the river <WH5104> of Chebar: <WH3529> and I fell <WH5307> on <WH5921> my face. <WH6440>

Then the spirit <WH7307> entered <WH935> into me, and set <WH5975> me upon <WH5921> my feet, <WH7272> and spoke <WH1696> with <WH854> me, and said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Go, <WH935> shut thyself <WH5462> within <WH8432> thine house. <WH1004>

But thou, <WH859> O son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> behold, <WH2009> they shall put <WH5414> bands <WH5688> upon <WH5921> thee, and shall bind <WH631> thee with them, and thou shalt not <WH3808> go out <WH3318> among <WH8432> them:

And I will make thy tongue <WH3956> cleave <WH1692> to <WH413> the roof of thy mouth, <WH2441> that thou shalt be dumb, <WH481> and shalt not <WH3808> be <WH1961> to them a reprover: <WH376> <WH3198> for <WH3588> they <WH1992> are a rebellious <WH4805> house. <WH1004>

But when I speak <WH1696> with <WH854> thee, I will open <WH6605> <WH853> thy mouth, <WH6310> and thou shalt say <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> He that heareth, <WH8085> let him hear; <WH8085> and he that forbeareth, <WH2310> let him forbear: <WH2308> for <WH3588> they <WH1992> are a rebellious <WH4805> house. <WH1004>
